ValidationRule.description: Make Lookback Period mandatory for certain Base Rates.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL( Base_Rate__c , 'SOFR'), ISPICKVAL( Base_Rate__c , 'TERM SOFR'), ISPICKVAL( Base_Rate__c , 'SONIA'), ISPICKVAL( Base_Rate__c , 'ESTR'), ISPICKVAL( Base_Rate__c , 'TONA'), ISPICKVAL( Base_Rate__c , 'SARON') ),
ISBLANK( Lookback_Period__c ) )
